poem.title: Also Ran
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text:
While engrossed in the crossword
(The job was that thrilling)
I chalked off a horse
That ran and won: Mandilinee.
How did you manage to do a stupid
Thing like that? said the regional manager.
(I think he'd on a grey raincoat). Oh,
I'd been practising all week.
